7th  The Clerk & Master reports that thare no proof that the Co- owes anything
8th  Thare is no proof that that thare are any sums due said Co
9th  He will report the nett loss or gain accrued to said association on [ ] cost of boat  $2152.56
See stock book pages
Expenses of running boat &6  $4181.31
See schedule A. page 6 of this report  $6333.87
The clerk reports that the boat was sold at Loudan under an exe-cution against said company and it not shown that any of the proceeds of the sale came to the hands of any member of said company and the debt that it was sold for is not taken into this account.  The Clerk & Master reports that Pearce recived a Capt for freight $1209.21
See Pierces acct in fill
Martin as capt paid balance that he recived over expenses of the boat to J.M. Bates  272.81
See Bates deposition in fill
carried over 1482.02
